price: 43.Qofkii sabra oo wax iska cafiya, kaasi16 waa arrin loo qasdo (la jecel yahay).
arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaman ṣabara waghafara inna dhālika lamin ʿazmi al-umūri
